fc.validated_field.color.s.desc: Use hue brightness map to change those values
fc.validated_field.color.s.usage.keyboar: Press up or down arrow keys to change color saturation
fc.validated_field.color.hl.desc: Only assigns hue and brightness. Use saturation slider to change saturation.
fc.validated_field.color.hl.usage.keyboa: Press left or right arrow to change color hue. Press up or down for color brightness
fc.validated_field.color.hl.usage.mouse: Click the map to assign a hue and light value
fc.validated_field.expression.ln.tip:
Natural Logarithm
computes log base 'e' on the given value
fc.validated_field.expression.min.tip:
Max
computes the maximum of the two given values
fc.validated_field.expression.max.tip:
Min
computes the minimum of the two given values
fc.validated_field.expression.log.tip:
Logarithm
computes log of the given first value with base of the second value
log[right](left)
fc.validated_field.expression.log10.tip:
Logarithm Base 10
computes log base 10 on the given value
fc.validated_field.expression.log2.tip:
Logarithm Base 2
computes log base 2 on the given value
fc.validated_field.expression.sqrt.tip:
Square Root
computes the square root of the given value
fc.validated_field.expression.abs.tip:
Absolute Value
computes the absolute value of the given value
fc.validated_field.expression.sin.tip:
Sine
computes the sine of the given value, in radians
fc.validated_field.expression.cos.tip:
Cosine
computes the cosine of the given value, in radians
fc.validated_field.expression.pow.tip:
Exponent
raises the value on the left side of the ^ to the power of the value on the right
fc.validated_field.expression.paren.tip:
Parentheses
adds a set of parentheses
fc.validated_field.expression.incr.tip:
Round-to-Increment
rounds the given value to the next closest lower multiple of the given increment.
incr(1.16, 0.1) will round to 1.1
fc.validated_field.expression.ciel.tip:
Ceiling
rounds the given value up (towards positive infinity)
fc.validated_field.expression.flr.tip:
Floor
rounds the given value down (towards negative infinity)
fc.validated_field.expression.rnd.tip:
Round
rounds the given value towards the nearest integer.
Ties round to the even number.
fc.validated_field.expression.plus.tip:
Plus
adds the left and right value
fc.validated_field.expression.minus.tip:
Minus
subtracts the right value from the left value
fc.validated_field.expression.times.tip:
Multiply
multiplies the left and right value
fc.validated_field.expression.div.tip:
Divide
divides the left value by the right value
fc.validated_field.expression.mod.tip:
Modulus
computes the remainder after dividing the left value by the right value
fc.validated_field.ingredient: Only values in selected type are kept
Number less than or equal to %s
Number greater than or equal to %s
fc.validated_field.number.slider.usage: Press left or right keys to change value. Press enter to confirm selection.
fc.validated_field.number.slider.usage.u: Drag slider to change value. Click checkmark to confirm selection.
fc.validated_field.number.textbox.invali: Invalid entry: Needs to be a number.
test.walkable.testChildDave.testChildBoo: Dave's favorite boolean. Please treat it well.
fc.networking.permission.cheat: Player [%1$s] may have tried cheating in server config changes!
fc.command.history: §6§lChange History at the time of the incident:§r
fc.command.accepted: Update Accepted; senders permissions are being re-synced: %s
fc.config.generic.section.desc: This Config Section doesn't implement it's translation key. The screen doesn't know what to call it!
fc.config.generic.field.desc: This Setting doesn't implement it's translation key. The screen doesn't know what to call it!
fc.config.restore.confirm.desc: Pressing Confirm will reset this setting to its default. Continue?
fc.config.back.desc:
Return to %s
(Hold shift to exit fully)
fc.config.search.desc:
Filter settings by name

$ : search descriptions
- : negate search
-$ : negate description
"" : exact search
-"" : negate exact search
fc.config.forwarded_error.c2s: Failed to forward the setting(s). The server isn't accepting this type of data, please contact an admin for help.
fc.config.forwarded_error.s2c: Failed to forward the setting(s). The player you are trying to forward the setting to doesn't have a compatible client.
fc.config.restart.warning: Changing this setting will require a restart!
fc.config.restart.warning.section: Some settings within this section will require a restart if changed!
fc.config.restart.warning.config: Some settings within this config will require a restart if changed!
fc.config.restart.update: You have received a configuration update that may require a client restart. Please contact a Server Operator if you have any questions.
fc.config.restart.update.client: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require a client restart.
fc.config.restart.update.server: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require a server restart. Connected clients have been automatically updated and notified; please follow up with players and/or staff members to schedule a restart.
fc.config.restart.sync: Settings received during synchronization require a client restart. Proceed?
fc.config.relog.warning: Changing this setting will require leaving and rejoining the current server or world!
fc.config.relog.warning.section: Some settings within this section will require leaving and rejoining the current server or world if changed!
fc.config.relog.warning.config: Some settings within this config will require leaving and rejoining the current server or world if changed!
fc.config.relog.update: You have received a configuration update that may require you to leave and rejoin the current server. Please contact a Server Operator if you have any questions.
fc.config.relog.update.client: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require leaving and rejoining the world.
fc.config.relog.update.server: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require leaving and rejoining the current server. Connected clients have been automatically updated and notified; please follow up with players as needed.
fc.config.reload_both.warning: Changing this setting will require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T).
fc.config.reload_both.warning.section: Some settings within this section will require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T) if changed.
fc.config.reload_both.warning.config: Some settings within this config will require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T) if changed.
fc.config.reload_both.update: You have received a configuration update that may require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T). Prepare for a possible server reload, and please contact a Server Operator if you have any questions.
fc.config.reload_both.update.client: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T).
fc.config.reload_both.update.server: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require reloading data packs (/reload) and resources (F3 + T). Connected clients have been automatically updated and notified that they need to reload resources; please follow up with players and/or staff members to schedule a reload.
fc.config.reload_data.warning: Changing this setting will require reloading data packs (/reload).
fc.config.reload_data.warning.section: Some settings within this section will require reloading data packs (/reload) if changed.
fc.config.reload_data.warning.config: Some settings within this config will require reloading data packs (/reload) if changed.
fc.config.reload_data.update: You have received a configuration update that may require reloading data packs. Please prepare for a possible server reload.
fc.config.reload_data.update.client: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require reloading data packs (/reload).
fc.config.reload_data.update.server: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require reloading data packs (/reload). Connected clients have been automatically updated and notified of the potential for a reload; please follow up with players and/or staff members to schedule a reload.
fc.config.reload_resources.warning: Changing this setting will require reloading resources (F3 + T).
fc.config.reload_resources.warning.secti: Some settings within this section will require reloading resources (F3 + T).
fc.config.reload_resources.warning.confi: Some settings within this config will require reloading resources (F3 + T) if changed.
fc.config.reload_resources.update: You have received a configuration update that may require reloading resources (F3 + T). Please contact a Server Operator if you have any questions.
fc.config.reload_resources.update.client: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require reloading resources (F3 + T).
fc.config.reload_resources.update.server: You have made changes to configuration(s) that require clients to reload resources (F3 + T). Connected clients have been automatically updated and notified; please follow up with players if there are any questions.
fc.button.apply.desc: Applies all changes and saves configs
fc.button.revert.desc: Reverts all changes just made to configs
fc.button.restore.confirm.desc: Pressing Confirm will reset these settings to their defaults. Continue?
fc.button.changelog.desc: Lists all changes just made to configs
fc.button.forward.active: Forward this entry to another player
fc.button.noPerms.desc: You don't have the proper permissions to edit this entry.
fc.button.outOfGame.desc: Join a game or connect to a server to edit this entry
fc.button.changes.title: Manage Changes
fc.button.changes.desc: Change management menu for applying and reverting changes.
fc.button.slider.usage.focused: Press up or down arrows to change value
fc.button.info.undo: §o[Ctrl + Z]§r - Undoes changes one-by-one new to old.
fc.button.info.copy: §o[Ctrl + C]§r - Copies hovered or selected setting.
fc.button.info.paste: §o[Ctrl + V]§r - Pastes copy buffer into compatible setting.
fc.button.info.save: §o[Ctrl + S]§r - Saves changes and sends updates to the server.
fc.button.info.page: §o[Pg Up/Pg Dwn]§r - Scrolls up/down a 'page' of settings.
fc.button.info.click: §o[Right Click]§r - Opens a context menu, if applicable.
fc.button.info.click_kb: §o[Shift + F10]§r - Opens a context menu, if applicable.
fc.button.info.click_kb2: §o[Context Menu Key]§r - Opens a context menu, if applicable.
fc.button.info.alert: §o[!]§r - Settings marked with an icon require an action if changed.
